bike.description: Diamond frame design with 6061 aluminum oversized tubing, sloping top tube design, water bottle bosses, alloy kickstand, and painted steel chainguard
bike.paint_description: Gloss Black, Monterey Blue, Sunset Red

components.description: Oversized hi-tensile steel tubular unicrown with leading dropout and fender boss
Alex Zuma 36H black anodized alloy rims with alloy nutted front hub and Hi-Stop CB rear, 14 gauge stainless steel spokes
Jamis Cruise-control comfort tread, 26x2.125" with white stripe
Forged alloy crank, 170mm alloy, with 44T compact disc chainring
Cruiser platform with TPE comfort insert
Alloy hi-rise, 180mm quill, 100mm extension, with removeable 2-bolt cap
Alloy micro-adjust, 27.2 x 300mm, with 31.8mm alloy clamp and cromo seatpin
Boss Cruiser design with extra padding and heavy-duty, double-loop springs
